More We shrink from our global responsibilities at our peril, as retrenchment brought about by short-sighted cuts could well lead to costlier and more tragic consequences later- indeed as they always have in the past. That's how Defense Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gates concluded his presentation about why the Barack Obama administration would cut$ 78 billion from the Pentagon's five-year budget. The foundation's position regarding a return of the bust of Nefertiti is unchanged, its president, Hermann Parzinger, said in a statement. "She is and remains Egypt's best ambassador in Berlin." The foundation reiterated its insistence that Nefertiti was acquired legitimately. Zahi Hawass
